name: One Man Army (Vdor01, Remarci)
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2, for the theme You are not alone in about a week.

Story

When the zombies take over the world, you are the only one, who can stop them... I mean YOU you! I mean... Oh, never mind.

It is said, that ~1,5% of the total population suffers from split personality. But you do not. You enjoy it!

Use your different personalities to gather xp, survive and stop the hord of zombies.
